title: Divination
costBlurb: The cost of this class is $600 (US).  You can pay via PayPal or Venmo (see buttons below), or you can send a check to:  The Reclaiming Loom, 3054 25th Street, San Francisco, CA 94110, and make the check payable to The Reclaiming Loom.  Thank you!  Welcome to Mirror Work.
